com.agorapulse.worker.processor

Class MethodJobProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.worker.processor.MethodJobProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.processor.AnnotationProcessor<Job,io.micronaut.inject.ExecutableMethod<?,?>>, io.micronaut.context.processor.ExecutableMethodProcessor<Job>

    @Singleton
public class MethodJobProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.micronaut.context.processor.ExecutableMethodProcessor<Job>
    A ExecutableMethodProcessor for the Job annotation.

    Based on io.micronaut.scheduling.processor.ScheduledMethodProcessor with additional option to configure jobs using configuration properties, reacting on incoming messages from a queue and publishing results of the execution to a queue.

    Since:
    1.0
